statements: DELETE FROM diagnostic_info WHERE vehicle_id = 500 AND diagnostic_id = 10;
DELETE FROM error_codes WHERE error_code = 404 AND vehicle_id = 12345;
DELETE FROM diagnostic_info WHERE vehicle_id = 54321 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM diagnostic_information WHERE error_code = 500 AND vehicle_id = 100;
DELETE FROM vehicle_readings WHERE reading_id IN (SELECT reading_id FROM vehicle_readings WHERE vehicle_id = 2021);
